name: Kill your TV
description:
A friendly advice for these crazy times: kill it. Kill your tv now. Stop being afraid. Stop checking the lifes of those who are richer, prettier, happier, but fake. Stop watching the news. Stop entertaining yourself with crap. Stop watching the stupid face of the guy on the news, and the guy on the weather.  Stop watching those idiotic commercials of home products and feminine products.
Kill your tv. Kill it now. Listen to music. Listen to your intuition. Don’t believe the truth.
